name: John Chris Key
summary: Productive, quality oriented professional eager to contribute comprehensive skills toward actively supporting a progressive organization as a key team member.

experience.title: Purchaser / Production Coordinator
experience.description: Coordinated production activities by interfacing with leads, project managers, and customer representatives regarding aircraft documentation, parts status, and delivery schedule. Managed aircraft paperwork, work cards during maintenance visits, and ensured proper communication of parts with Purchasing to expedite delivery. Generated daily reports on parts statuses, man hours, and aircraft schedule; interfaced with accounting and quality to ensure payments, billings, and supplier approvals; supported AOG operations and supplier relationships; focused on achieving industry-standard performance and cost savings.

experience.title: Purchasing Clerk / Material Specialist
experience.description: Quoted and purchased materials for Aircraft and Stock; handled Stores / Warehouse, Shipping, and Receiving. Obtained quotes, secured approvals, coordinated shipping and payment, matched invoices to POs, tracked shipments, verified material certification, loaded materials into the system, and issued materials. Maintained records using Excel, Word, and Adobe; supported AOG logistics and maintenance facility representations.

experience.title: Purchasing Agent / Material Expeditor
experience.description: Expedited material to ensure smooth production flow; coordinated order and shipment processes; sourced price and availability, built relationships with vendors, retrieved required paperwork and certifications, and expedited materials to various departments. Managed AOG orders and supported maintenance and aviation standards across multiple airlines and military customers.
